item.title: Release Tracking
item.description: Here’s quick and easy way to be notified when software projects that you care about publish new releases. Register for free account on blogtrottr.com click the link to Subscribe to a new feed find the URL for the software project you want to know of new releases for schedule select daily digest subscribe to monitor atom feed New Subscription blogtrottr will now check each of these once per day and notify you of new releases
